SELECT u.user_id as user_id
FROM TO0_USER_MAIN u left outer join TO0_DEPT_MAST d on u.dept_key = d.dept_key left outer join TO0_RANK_MAIN r on u.rank_key = r.rank_key left outer join TO0_DUTY_MAIN du on u.duty_key = du.duty_key left outer join TO0_POSITION_MAIN po on u.position_key = po.position_key WHERE r.rank_title not in('대표이사', '실장')
